product.description: Recyclaro is a B2B marketplace designed for the buying, selling, and management of industrial recyclables. It facilitates transparent, secure, and sustainable trade by connecting verified buyers and suppliers of various recyclable materials including metal, plastic, paper, e-waste, batteries, and textiles.

specifications.materials_traded: Metal, Plastic, Paper, E-waste, Batteries, Textiles

features.name: B2B Marketplace
features.description: A platform specifically designed for business-to-business transactions.

features.name: Verified Buyers and Suppliers
features.description: Connects with a network of pre-vetted participants for secure trading.

features.name: Transparent Trade
features.description: Ensures clarity and openness in all transactions.

features.name: Secure Trade
features.description: Provides a safe environment for buying and selling recyclables.

features.name: Sustainable Trade
features.description: Promotes environmentally responsible practices in the recycling industry.

features.name: Management Tools
features.description: Offers functionalities for managing industrial recyclables.

product.targeted_market: Businesses involved in the recycling industry, including manufacturers generating industrial waste, recycling facilities, waste management companies, and businesses looking to source recycled materials for their operations.
product.problem_product_is_solving: The product addresses challenges in the industrial recyclables market by providing a centralized, trusted platform for efficient buying and selling, improving transparency and security in transactions, and facilitating sustainable trade practices. It aims to streamline the process of connecting buyers and sellers of diverse recyclable materials, which can otherwise be fragmented and opaque.
